document.title: Technical Bulletins: Tennessee's Anti-Discrimination Law: A Reminder about the Handicapped
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin outlines some of the main provisions of Tennessee's anti-discrimination law as applicable to the employment of handicapped persons. The actual language of the act (TCA 8-50- 103, 104) is also included.
